title: SEC Filing Risk Scanner
description: Scan stocks for SEC red flags including 8-K filings and insider trading patterns

scanMode.title: Scan Mode
scanMode.description: Choose which stocks to scan: your custom list, all S&P 500, or NASDAQ 100

tickers.title: Stock Tickers
tickers.description: List of stock tickers to analyze (only used when Scan Mode is 'Custom Tickers')

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of stocks to process per batch (for S&P 500 or NASDAQ 100 scans)

incrementalMode.title: Incremental Mode
incrementalMode.description: Skip stocks with no new SEC filings since last scan (saves time on scheduled runs, only applies to S&P 500 and NASDAQ 100 modes)

lookbackDays.title: Lookback Days
lookbackDays.description: Number of days of SEC filings to analyze

includeExplanation.title: Include AI Explanation
includeExplanation.description: Generate plain-English explanation of risk signals (uses AI)

alertThreshold.title: Alert Threshold
alertThreshold.description: Risk score threshold for webhook alerts (0-100)

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: Optional URL for alert notifications when risk exceeds threshold
